We aim to make the layer reproducible by making the code publicly
available under an open source license[^CC-BY]. The code itself requires
database updates continuously. Rerunning the code on the current
database might yield a different layer. Therefore we also republish the
OpenStreetMap data we used. When we need to update the open space layer,
we will add an updated snapshot as a new version. Having both the code
and the data available under version control, allows to recreate both
the most recent version as any older version.
